resources.string: You are not connected to the internet. We can not get the YahooForecast so.
We can not obtain data from the YahooForecast. Are you sure you are really connected? check your notification bar to see if there is message on your network connection.
Swipe the listview to refresh data works too.
An exception occurs, nobody knows what happens, developpers made shit again, sorry.
The database don\'t want to open. Please re-try later. Nothing to do. We are sorry about that.
We have a problem to understand the date... Perhaps date are not well displayed. We apologize.
We have a problem to store the data in database. Nothing to worry about. We apologize.
A problem occurs when communicating with internet. Retry latter. We apologize.
A problem occurs when retrieving the data. Retry latter. We apologize.
A problem occurs when understanding the data. This will be fixed soon. We apologize.
A problem occurs when loading the picture. Nothing to worry about. We apologize.
A problem occurs when saving the picture. Nothing to worry about. We apologize.
A problem occurs when parsing the cities. Nothing to worry about. We apologize.
A problem occurs when trying to open a map on your phone. It seems there is no map application... We apologize.
A problem occurs when trying to add the city in the database. It can be not registered. We apologize.
A problem occurs when trying to delete the city in the database. We apologize.
The city is already in database. Nothing to update and no worries.
Please give the name of the city you search
